nodes.name: Warehouse Entrance Left Door (to Boyon Gate Hall)

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Entrance Left Door (to Boyon Gate Hall)
Runway with Cleared Super Blocks - Warehouse Entrance Left Door (to Boyon Gate Hall)

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Must break 3 Super Blocks for this longer runway to be usable.

nodes.name: Warehouse Entrance Right Door (to Warehouse Zeelas)

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Entrance Right Door (to Warehouse Zeelas)

strats.name: Kraid Entrance Wiggle
strats.note: This strat makes it possible to squeeze through Morphless with just 2 supers.

strats.name: Kraid Entrance Squeeze
strats.note: Use 2 supers, then squeeze through with a spin jump or down-aim jump.

strats.name: Kraid Exit Wiggle
strats.note: Shoot out the bottom two super blocks and crouch-wiggle through.

strats.name: Kraid Exit Squeeze
strats.note: Use 2 supers, then squeeze through with a spin jump or down-aim jump.

strats.name: Jump Over the Pit
strats.note: Break all 3 super blocks to build enough run speed to jump over the pit.

strats.name: Kraid Entrance Walljump
strats.note: It's much easier without speed booster equipped.

strats.name: Kraid Entrance Speedjump
note: Run along the bottom of the pit to build speed for a speedy jump.
Only run 7.5 tiles left to right. If done optimally, no wall jump is required.

strats.name: SpringBall
strats.note: Use Springball as a movement item to reach the Kraid Mouth ledge by jumping from the elevator runway, or by jumping from below.
strats.devNote: By reaching 4, the super wall has been broken enough to fit in morph.

nodes.name: Warehouse Zeelas Top Left Door (to Warehouse Entrance)

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Zeelas Top Left Door (to Warehouse Entrance)

nodes.name: Warehouse Zeelas Bottom Left Door (to E-Tank)

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Zeelas Bottom Left Door (to E-Tank)

locks.name: Warehouse Zeela Room Grey Lock (to E-Tank)

nodes.name: Warehouse Zeelas Right Vertical Door (to Kihunters)

strats.name: Zeela Farm
devNote: FIXME: Node 3 could be used to reset the room, with additional requirements.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Wiggle back and forth to get through the bomb blocks before the Zeela hits Samus.
strats.devNote: This is off camera, but doesnt require canOffScreenMovement because of its simplicity.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
note: Wiggle back and forth to get through the bomb blocks while avoiding the off screen Zeela.
Unmorph and exit G-Mode then quickly run back and forth to fix the camera or go through the door.

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse E-Tank Right Door (to Zeelas)

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: This is a softlock if no means to kill Beetoms are available.

strats.name: Beetom Farm
strats.note: Kill the Beetoms with Screw Attack or by freezing or carefully avoiding them and using Bombs or Power Bombs.
devNote: FIXME: Using a Missile, Super, or Power Bomb at the start could be added to the logic to get the first Power Bombs to use for further farming, but this needs a way to express that we're not in health-bomb energy range.

strats.name: Tricky Evade
note: Wait by the door briefly before spin jumping over and grabbing the item.
It is also possible to do this instead by entering with run speed and quickly grabbing the item.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Kill the Beetoms
strats.note: Roll in while avoiding the Beetoms. It is possible to kill them all without getting hit; one of the most safe areas is the center of the lower floor.
devNote: There is no way to avoid all damage in direct g-mode, nor a way to get out of immobile.
It is technically possible but very precise to kill them with a Power Bomb entering with 4 energy and both suits.

nodes.name: Warehouse Kihunters Left Vertical Door (to Zeelas)

strats.name: Closed Door
strats.note: Use the door for additional runway then open it once the Shinecharge is complete.

gModeImmobile.devNote: It looks like the only way to remain in the room is by starting on the right side and triggering a turnaround, with or without artificial morph.

nodes.name: Warehouse Kihunters Bottom Right Door (to Baby Kraid)

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Kihunters Bottom Right Door (to Baby Kraid)

strats.name: Warehouse Kihunter Room Bottom Spark Out
strats.note: Charge a spark, then break the shot blocks, drop through, and spark out the bottom right door.

runways.name: Base Runway - Warehouse Kihunters Right Door (to Save)

strats.name: Warehouse Kihunter Room Tunnel Charge
strats.note: Generate a charge on the left side and carry it through the morph tunnel and out the right door.

note: MustOpenDoorFirst set to false because the requirements of the pathToDoor (going 1 -> 3) already cover getting to the door and back.
Besides, it's also possible to shoot the door before sparking out, if trickier.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
strats.note: Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are just above the shot blocks.
strats.devNote: In immobile, the Kihunters are in a worse location, but Samus starts with i-frames.

strats.name: Tricky Dodge
note: Jump between the kihunters to avoid damage.
To kill the kihunters, shoot them as they come on screen.
devNote: This strat can avoid the kihunters well enough to reach further nodes or it can kill them.
In both cases tricky dodging and accurate shooting is used.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: The Kihunters can be killed from below but there is a chance one will drop down the hole.  Watch them before breaking the shot block.

strats.name: Crouch Jump Down Grab
note: This crouch jump down grab is a little tighter than most.
The Kihunters can be killed from below but there is a chance one will drop down the hole. Watch them before breaking the shot block.

strats.name: Damage Boost
note: Use a kihunter to knock Samus out of the hole at the peak of her jump
This strat may take a few attempts to get a good boost.

strats.name: Warehouse Kihunter Room X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen

strats.name: Block Already Broken
strats.note: The Kihunters can be killed by retreating to the morph tunnel if needed.

strats.name: Bomb the Block
strats.note: The Kihunters can be killed by retreating to the morph tunnel if needed.

strats.name: Power Bomb the Block
note: The Kihunters can be killed by retreating to the morph tunnel if needed.
Placing the Power Bomb far to the left will also destroy the shot blocks going down.

strats.name: SpeedBall
strats.note: The Kihunters can be killed by retreating to the morph tunnel if needed.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs
note: Rolling on the ground will overload PLMs by moving through camera scroll blocks.
Lure all of the Kihunters to the top right position, then quickly move left, exit g-mode and retreat to one of the other exits.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Reaching 4 means obstacle B is open.

strats.name: Power Bomb the Block
strats.note: Placing the Power Bomb against the right wall will not break the shot blocks going down.

strats.name: Warehouse Kihunter Speedball
note: A very low horizontal speed is needed to drop down and break the block without hitting the corner to the left or the block above the bomb block.
Or with Temporary Blue, Samus can bounce into the bomb block.

runways.name: Base Runway - Baby Kraid Left Door (to Kihunters)

strats.name: Base
strats.note: We won't worry about obstacles as requirements here, because achieving blue suit will destroy them anyhow.

locks.name: Baby Kraid Left Grey Lock (to Kihunters)

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: Enemies can be killed by going between nodes 1 and 2.

nodes.name: Baby Kraid Right Door (to Eye Room)

runways.name: Base Runway - Baby Kraid Right Door (to Eye Room)

strats.name: Base
strats.note: We won't worry about obstacles as requirements here, because achieving blue suit will destroy them anyhow.

locks.name: Baby Kraid Right Grey Lock (to Eye Room)

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: Enemies can be killed by going between nodes 1 and 2.

strats.name: Kill the Enemies
strats.devNote: Power Bombs only sometimes work on mini kraid for some reason.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: Quickly run through to tank the Pirate (or its laser) and one of Mini-Kraid's spikes.

strats.name: Speedbooster Dodge Kill
note: Shoot the pirates to prevent their lasers, then jump over them to get to the runway.
Mini-Kraid spikes will block the runway fairly quickly; a shortcharge can allow for more run space but isn't required.
strats.devNote: You have to move somewhat quickly to not need a shortcharge.

strats.name: Dodge
strats.note: Shoot the pirates to prevent their lasers, then jump over them. Tank one Mini-Kraid spike.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Bomb Kill
note: Wait for the pirates to move as far right as possible in order to kill them all with a single Power Bomb.
Unmorph and kill Baby Kraid before exiting G-Mode. Run away, exit g-mode, then jump over the spike projectiles.

strats.name: Enemies Already Killed
strats.devNote: Power Bombs only sometimes work on mini kraid for some reason.

strats.name: Speed Kill
strats.note: Gain Iframes by taking damage then run left to create enough space to run back to the right with speedbooster.

strats.name: Pacifist
strats.note: Wait to hit one of Mini-Kraid's spikes, then run through.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Bomb Kill
strats.note: Kill all of the enemies with bombs. Samus will take a Baby Kraid spike hit while rolling through the invisible projectiles.

strats.name: Green Pirates and Mini-Kraid Farm
strats.devNote: These two farms are combined, to allow an option of using using Supers farmed from Mini-Kraid to kill the Pirates.

nodes.name: Kraid Eye Room Left Door (to Baby Kraid)

runways.name: Base Runway - Kraid Eye Room Left Door (to Baby Kraid)

nodes.name: Kraid Eye Room Top Right Door (to Recharge)

runways.name: Base Runway - Kraid Eye Room Top Right Door (to Recharge)

locks.name: Kraid Eye Room Green Lock (to Recharge)

nodes.name: Kraid Room Left Door (to Eye Room)

runways.name: Base Runway - Kraid Room Left Door (to Eye Room)

locks.name: Kraid Left Grey Lock (to Eye Room)

runways.name: Base Runway - Kraid Room Right Door (to Varia)

unlockStrats.name: Missiles
unlockStrats.note: Only 2 Missiles are needed to get Kraid to stand up, after which they are farmable.

unlockStrats.name: Supers
unlockStrats.note: 4 supers are required to kill Kraid. Only 1 is needed to get him to stand up, after which they are farmable, even though the drop rate is low.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: You can actually do the Kraid fight normally if entering from the right door, but it will put Samus into the thorns.

strats.name: Prepared with Space Jump
strats.note: Being prepared and space jumping through the room can prevent a thorn hit.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Door is reachable mid-fight but locked

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Door is not reachable mid-fight

runways.name: Base Runway - Varia Suit Room Door (to Kraid)
Base Runway - Kraid Save Room Door (to Kihunters)
Base Runway - Kraid Recharge Door (to Eye Room)
